name: Sword Art Online: Hollow Realization
summary: Sword Art Online: Hollow Realization is a Japanese role-playing game and the fourth game based on the Sword Art Online light novel franchise.

alternative_names.name: ソードアート・オンライン ―ホロウ・リアリゼーション―

esrb.synopsis: This is a role-playing game in which players explore a fantasy world with a group of friends and their avatars. As players explore environments and interact with characters, they can perform quests and engage in battles with humans and creatures (e.g., giant animals, dragons). Players use swords, spears, maces, and magic attacks to battle enemies in melee-style combat. Battles are highlighted by cries of pain, impact sounds, and light effects. Some female characters wear outfits that reveal large amounts of cleavage. One scene depicts a still image of a character grabbing a female character's breast after a fall; another scene depicts a partially nude character in the bath with her breasts and genitalia covered by bubbles. Characters sometimes discuss an enemy's use and addiction to “digital drugs” (e.g., “Seems like this digital drug takes a pretty serious toll on people who use it too much,“ and "He's been chasing the digital drug high.”). The words “bastard,” and “a*s” appear in the dialogue.

pegi.synopsis: This game has been rated PEGI 12 for depictions of non-realistic violence towards human-like characters, sexual posturing and mild bad language. Not suitable for persons under 12 years of age.
